Package DBAccess

Class DBReporting

java.lang.Object
DBAccess.DBReporting
public class DBReporting extends Object
This method defines the methods querying the database for the information needed for the reporting page of the application.

  • Method Details

    • getTypes

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getTypes() throws SQLException
      This method queries the database for the distinct type values found in the appointments table.
      Returns:
      An observable list of all queried types.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception thrown from database command.

    • getMonths

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getMonths() throws SQLException
      This method queries the database for the distinct month values found in the appointments table.
      Returns:
      An observable list of all queried months.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception thrown from database command.

    • typeMonthApts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> typeMonthApts(String selectedType, String selectedMonth)
      Queries the database for all appointments with the given type and monthname values of the start date.
      Parameters:
      selectedType - The type to search for in the appointments table.
      selectedMonth - The month to search for in the start column of the appointments table.
      Returns:
      An observable list of all appointments with the matching values.

    • getContactApts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getContactApts(Contacts givenContact)
      This method queries the database for all appointments with the given contact value.
      Parameters:
      givenContact - The contact to search for in the customerId column of the appointments table.
      Returns:
      An observable list of all appointments with the matching value.

    • getUserApts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getUserApts(Users givenUser)
      Method queries the database for all appointments with the userID of the given user value.
      Parameters:
      givenUser - The user to search for in the appointments table.
      Returns:
      An observableList of the appointments with the matching user value.
